title: Angular SuperUI - Component Library Updates
description: Latest updates, new components, and announcements from Angular SuperUI - the ultimate headless UI component library for Angular

items.title: Angular SuperUI 2.0.0 - Major Release with 39+ Components
items.content_html:
We're excited to announce Angular SuperUI 2.0.0, our biggest release yet featuring 39+ production-ready components!

ðŸŽ‰ What's New

  • 39+ Components: Complete collection of headless UI components
  • Enhanced CLI: New 'ngsui' command for easier installation
  • Better TypeScript: Improved type safety and IntelliSense
  • Accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across all components
  • Performance: Tree-shakable, zero dependencies

Install today: npm install -g ngsui
items.content_text: Angular SuperUI 2.0.0 features 39+ production-ready components with enhanced CLI and improved TypeScript support. Install today: npm install -g ngsui
items.summary: Angular SuperUI 2.0.0 features 39+ production-ready components with enhanced CLI and improved TypeScript support

items.title: New Enhanced Calendar Component with Time Picker
items.content_html:
Our Calendar component just got a major upgrade! Now featuring integrated time picker, range selection with drag support, and enhanced accessibility.

âœ¨ Features

  • Date range selection with intuitive drag support
  • Integrated time picker for complete date-time handling
  • Full accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1)
  • Beautiful TailwindCSS styling with custom themes
  • Fully responsive design for all screen sizes
items.content_text: Enhanced Calendar component with time picker, range selection, and improved accessibility. Perfect for booking systems and scheduling applications.
items.summary: Enhanced Calendar component with time picker, range selection with drag support, and improved accessibility

items.title: Enterprise Data Table with Advanced Features
items.content_html:
Introducing our most powerful component yet - the Enterprise Data Table with sorting, filtering, pagination, and inline editing.

ðŸŽ¯ Enterprise Features

  • Advanced sorting and filtering
  • Virtual scrolling for large datasets
  • Inline editing capabilities
  • Column resizing and reordering
  • Export functionality (CSV, PDF, Excel)
  • Server-side pagination support
items.content_text: Enterprise Data Table with advanced sorting, filtering, pagination, inline editing, and virtual scrolling for large datasets.
items.summary: Enterprise Data Table with advanced features for mission-critical applications
